game.name: Pip's Potion Shop
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: With your shop on the line, meet unique characters and craft potions of every flavor in this short, light-hearted game. From giant constructs to quirky little creatures, listen to their troubles and mix the right ingredients to create a potion that soothes their hearts and satisfies their cravings!
